actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to adjust the boundary of the Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park to include the Wallis House and Harriston Hill, and for other purposes.
short_title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2015

summary.text:
Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2015 

 Modifies the boundary of the Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park in Georgia to include approximately eight acres identified as Wallis House and Harriston Hill.

Authorizes the Department of the Interior to acquire land or interests, by donation or exchange, from willing sellers only.
